query.none: Keine Server stimmten mit der Abfrage überein.

group.none: Kein Server in dieser Gruppe ist derzeit verfügbar.

permission.premium: Du musst ein Premium-Spieler sein, um diesen Befehl nutzen zukönnen.

no.key: You do not have a matching crate and key. Find a matching key at {0}.

click.key: Use this key on its corresponding crate.

rank.received: You have received the {0} rank! Relog to get any permissions from the rank!

disallow.permission: Du bist nicht berechtigt, diesen Server zu betreten.

prestige.confirm: You're about to level up to prestige {0}. Are you sure? {1} - {2}

cooldown.plural: You must wait {0} seconds before using /report again.
cooldown.singular: You must wait {0} second before using /report again.

recent.none: There are no recent reports to view.

report.sent: Your report has been sent to online staff.

fail.participating: Du kannst dich nicht teleportieren solange du im Spiel bist.

reportnotification.name: ReportNotification
reportnotification.summary: If a sound should be played when you receive a report.

staffchannels.name: StaffChannels
staffchannels.summary: If staff channels (reports, staff, etc) should be viewed.
staffchannels.disabled: You currently have staff channels disabled.

bar.name: ShowXPBar
bar.description: Show the bar above your hotbar that indicates your prestige progress.

premium.name: PremiumChat
premium.description: If premium chat should be shown.

levelup.fail: You do not have enough XP levels to reach the next prestige. ({0} ({1} levels) more XP required).
levelup.max: You have reached the max prestige and may not level up any more. Good job! The next season starts in {0}.
levelup.broadcast: {0} has leveled up and is now at level {1}!
levelup.nearby: You have received {0} XP because you were near a player who leveled up.
levelup.maxbroadcast: WOW!! {0} has reached the max prestige level for this season! That takes dedication
